document.masterDocTitle: A review of the genus Oodescelis Motschulsky, 1845 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae Platyscelidini) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material (studied). Lectotype , designated here:
♂ ( HNHM ), Wernyi //
Pl. heydeni Seidl., Coll. Reitter
// Typus,
Platyscelis similis
sp. n. 1937, Dr Kaszab ( Figs. 61 , 79 ).
Paralectotype :
1♂ ( HNHM ), Wernyi //
Pl. tibialis Ball., Coll. Reitter
// Co-Typus,
Oodescelis similis
n. sp. 1938, Kaszab.
Holotype
of
Platyscelis clavatipes
: ♂ ( HNHM ), Aksu, China , Terkes // Typus,
Platyscelis clavatipes
m. 1937, Dr Kaszab.
